direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods deal with the base URI of the element, with one retrieving and the other setting the URI.
Both methods involve traversing the element hierarchy to find or set a specific attribute.
Both methods retrieve attributes from the element, though 'attr' is more general and can retrieve any attribute.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require URL parser initialization.
Environment setup is required before validating URLs.
Both methods verify URL formats and handle similar exceptions.
